name: shadow-tag
caption: Shadow Tag

effect.short: Prevents opponents from fleeing or switching out.
effect.full:
While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.

Other Pokémon with this ability are unaffected.  Pokémon with []{ability:run-away} can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.

flavorText:
This Pokémon steps on the opposing Pokémon’s
shadow to prevent it from escaping.
